confirmDialog.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone.

wizard.domainHint: Enter your domain name without http:// or www

fileManager.unsavedChanges: This file has unsaved changes. Close anyway?

databases.title: Database Manager
databases.description: Manage your MySQL databases and users

databases.hostHint: Use localhost for local connections or % for any host
databases.userCreateWarning: Database created but failed to create user
databases.deleteUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete database user {username}?
databases.rootPasswordDesc: Change the MySQL root password. The .env file will be updated automatically.
databases.rootPasswordWarning: Warning: This is a sensitive operation. Make sure to save the new password in a safe place.
databases.syncFromServerDesc: Import existing MySQL databases from the server into the panel.
databases.noServerDatabases: No new databases found on server
databases.ssoNotAvailable: Auto-login is not available. Password not stored for this database user.
databases.bulkDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} databases? This action cannot be undone.

email.title: Email Accounts
email.noAccountsDesc: You don't have any email accounts for this domain.
email.enableMailFirst: Enable mail for this domain to create email accounts.
email.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {email}?
email.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete email account {email}? All emails will be deleted.
email.catchAllDesc: Receive all emails sent to non-existent addresses
email.clientConfigDescription: Use these settings to configure your email client (Outlook, Thunderbird, Apple Mail, etc.)
email.usernameNoteDesc: Use your full email address (e.g., user@yourdomain.com) as the username.

spam.title: Spam Settings
spam.description: Configure spam filtering for your email
spam.rejectScoreDesc: Messages with score above this are rejected
spam.addHeaderScoreDesc: Messages with score above this get spam header
spam.greylistScoreDesc: Messages with score above this are greylisted
spam.whitelistDesc: Emails and domains that bypass spam filtering
spam.blacklistDesc: Emails and domains that are always marked as spam

ssl.noSSLDesc: This domain is not secured with SSL
ssl.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this SSL certificate?

dns.title: DNS Management
dns.ipHint: Enter a valid IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.1). Each number must be 0-255.
dns.noZonesDesc: No DNS zones found. Create a zone to manage DNS records.
dns.name: Name
dns.noRecordsDesc: This zone has no records yet.
dns.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this DNS zone? All records will be deleted.
dns.deleteRecordConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this DNS record?
dns.zoneFilePlaceholder:
; BIND Zone File Format
$TTL 3600
@ IN A 192.168.1.1
www IN CNAME @
dns.zoneFileHint: Paste BIND zone file content. Supports $TTL, $ORIGIN directives.
dns.cloneHint: Clone DNS records from this zone to the selected zone.
dns.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this zone to default records? All existing records except SOA will be deleted.
dns.bulkDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected records?

ftp.title: FTP Accounts
ftp.usernameHint: Must start with letter, 3-32 chars, letters/numbers/underscore only
ftp.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete FTP account {username}?
ftp.folderBrowserHint: Click to open folder, double-click or click Select button to choose folder
ftp.bulkDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} FTP account(s)? This action cannot be undone.

firewall.title: Firewall Management
firewall.description: Manage firewall rules to protect your server
firewall.disabledWarningDesc: Your server is not protected by the firewall. It is highly recommended to enable it.
firewall.noRulesDesc: No firewall rules have been configured yet.
firewall.sourceIpHint: Leave empty to allow from anywhere
firewall.deleteRuleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this firewall rule?
firewall.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the firewall to default settings? This will remove all custom rules.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Manage your backups and restore points
backup.configDescription: Configure backup settings, destination, and schedule
backup.activeConfigHint: Enable or disable this backup configuration
backup.noConfigsDesc: Create a backup configuration to start protecting your data.
backup.noBackupsDesc: No backups have been created yet.
backup.typeFullDesc: Backup all data including files, databases, emails and configurations
backup.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one item to backup
backup.destinationMultipleHint: Select one or more destinations for your backups
backup.noConnectedRemotes: No cloud storage remotes are configured or connected.
backup.selectAtLeastOneDestination: Please select at least one destination
backup.repositoryPasswordHint: This password encrypts your backup data. Keep it safe!
backup.includePathsHint: Paths to include in backup (one per line)
backup.fetchRemoteBackupsFailed: Failed to fetch backups from remote storage
backup.syncToLocalFirst: Sync to local storage first to restore
backup.remoteRestoreDesc: This backup was deleted locally but still exists on remote storage. The system will automatically download the backup from one of the following remotes before restoring:
backup.syncFailed: Failed to sync backup to remote storage
backup.alreadyRunning: A backup is already running for this configuration
backup.deleteBackupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this backup? This action cannot be undone.
backup.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected backups? This action cannot be undone.
backup.deleteConfigConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this backup configuration? All associated backups will also be deleted.
backup.storageRemotesDesc: Configure cloud storage destinations for your backups
backup.noRemotesDesc: Configure cloud storage remotes to upload backups to FTP, Google Drive, and more.
backup.remoteNameHint: Only letters, numbers, and underscores allowed
backup.remoteInUse: Cannot delete: remote is used by backup configurations
backup.rcloneNotInstalledDesc: Rclone is required for cloud storage features. Install it to continue.
backup.oauthDescription: Click the button below to connect your cloud storage account. A new window will open for authentication.
backup.cloudBackupFolderHint: Specify the folder path in your cloud storage where backups will be stored. Useful when multiple servers use the same account.
backup.oauthNameRequired: Please enter remote name and display name first
backup.oauthWindowOpened: Authentication window opened. Please complete the authorization.
backup.oauthErrorInvalidState: Invalid OAuth state. Please try again.
backup.oauthErrorTokenExchange: Failed to exchange authorization code for tokens
backup.noFilesFound: No files found in this directory
backup.targetPathHint: Leave as '/' to restore to original locations
backup.restoreWarning: Warning: Restoring will overwrite existing files in the target location. Make sure you have a backup of current data before proceeding.
backup.restoreDescription: Restore data from a backup snapshot
backup.notFoundDesc: The requested backup could not be found or has been deleted.
backup.noObjectsSelected: No objects selected. Select items from the left panel.
backup.restoreOriginalDesc: Overwrite existing files with backup data
backup.restoreSafeDesc: Restore to temporary directory for review
backup.restoreWarningOverwrite: This will overwrite existing files at their original locations. Make sure you have a backup of current data.
backup.dbRestoreNoDowntime: Database restore doesn't affect other websites
backup.dbRestoreNoDowntimeDesc: Database restore uses SQL-based method without stopping MySQL, so other websites will continue working normally during the restore process.
backup.restoreInfoSafe: Files will be restored to the specified path. You can review and manually copy files as needed.
backup.browseFilesDesc: Explore the backup contents and select specific files to restore.
backup.filesAddedToRestore: Selected files added to restore list
backup.oldBackupFormatTitle: Old backup doesn't support Database restore
backup.oldBackupFormatDesc: This backup was created before SQL dump feature was implemented. To restore database without affecting other websites, please create a NEW backup.
backup.oldBackupFormatSolution: Create a new backup to enable zero-downtime database restore

security.title: Security Dashboard
security.description: Monitor and manage your server security

security.noRecommendations: No recommendations. Your server security is well configured!
security.auditLogDescription: View all system activity and security events

security.noBannedIpsDesc: No IP addresses are currently banned.
security.unbanConfirm: Are you sure you want to unban this IP?
security.confirmDeleteJail: Are you sure you want to delete this jail?
security.presetSshDesc: Protect SSH from brute-force login attempts
security.presetNginxBotDesc: Block bots scanning for vulnerable URLs
security.presetNginxLimitDesc: Ban IPs exceeding Nginx rate limits
security.presetPostfixDesc: Protect Postfix SMTP from authentication attacks

mail.outlookHint: Use your Outlook/Office 365 account credentials. If 2FA is enabled, you may need to create an app password.
mail.sendmailHint: Sendmail uses the local mail transfer agent installed on the server. No additional configuration is required.
